long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a personalized and vibrant experience with Tab Overrider - Discover an Awesome Tab!

Tab Overrider provided for you to create a new tab that reflects your style and boosts your productivity. Enjoy an array of customization options, including 10+ easy-to-use features. Choose from an extensive collection of wallpapers and widgets to make your new tab truly unique.

We prioritize your privacy. Tab Overrider is completely free and requires no permissions.

By adding Tab Overrider, you're agreeing to enhance your Chromeâ„¢ New Tab experience and accept our Terms of Use (https://instaidol.co/terms.html) and Privacy Policy (https://instaidol.co/privacy-policy.html). Please note that the extension updates your search settings and provides a new tab provided by Microsoft Bing.
